Class ChartFactory

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.apps.framework.ChartFactory
public final class ChartFactory extends Object
Factory for creating charts used in JScience Killer Apps. Provides line charts, bar charts, area charts, and real-time updates.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)

    Helper class for real-time chart updates.

    • createCandlestickPlaceholder

      public static javafx.scene.layout.StackPane createCandlestickPlaceholder(String title)
      Creates a styled candlestick-like visual using rectangles. Note: JavaFX doesn't have built-in candlestick charts, so we provide a simplified bar representation.
